Amazonia Neroli Blossom Vitamin Toner

Brand: Amazonia

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Citrus Aurantium Amara Flower Distillate (Neroli Hydrosol), Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Urea, Sodium PCA (Natural Salt Humectant), Glycerin (Plant-derived), Sodium Hyaluronate, *Propanediol (Corn-Derived Humectant), Panthenol (Provitamin B-5), Lactobacillus Ferment (Probiotics), Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Chamomilla

Humectant), Glycerin (Plant-derived), Sodium Hyaluronate, *Propanediol (Corn-Derived Humectant), Panthenol (Provitamin B-5), Lactobacillus Ferment (Probiotics), Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Chamomilla (Chamomile) Recutita Flower Extract, Calendula (Flower) Officinalis Extract, Hydrolyzed Oat Protein, *Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate,

(Probiotics), Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Chamomilla (Chamomile) Recutita Flower Extract, Calendula (Flower) Officinalis Extract, Hydrolyzed Oat Protein, *Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, *Lonicera Japonica Flower Extract, *Lonicera Caprifolium (Flower) Extract, *Populus Tremuloides (Aspen) Bark Extract, *Gluconolactone, Allantoin (Comfrey

*Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, *Lonicera Japonica Flower Extract, *Lonicera Caprifolium (Flower) Extract, *Populus Tremuloides (Aspen) Bark Extract, *Gluconolactone, Allantoin (Comfrey Root).
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
